title: Fact-check: Did Donald Trump 'falsely' suggest Kamala Harris misled voters about her race?
'Venezuela destroyed': Trump blames 'crazy Kamala Harris' for deal with Maduro
content: ​Former US president Donald Trump blamed 'crazy Kamala Harris' for the situation in Venezuela and said she should never have taken the Trump oil sanctions off Nicholas Maduro. Venezuela is destroyed and its people are bankrupt and much of their blood is on the hands of "dangerously liberal and failed American politicians like Crazy Kamala Harris and Crooked Joe Biden," Trump posted on Truth Social.
summary: ​Former US president Donald Trump blamed 'crazy Kamala Harris' for the situation in Venezuela and said she should never have taken the Trump oil sanctions off Nicholas Maduro. Venezuela is destroyed and its people are bankrupt and much of their blood is on the hands of "dangerously liberal and failed American politicians like Crazy Kamala Harris and Crooked Joe Biden," Trump posted on Truth Social.

title: Donald Trump questions if Kamala Harris is 'Indian or black'; sparks controversy
content: Republican presidential candidate and former president Donald Trump questioned Kamala Harris' racial identity during a speech at the National Association of Black Journalists, causing backlash. Trump’s remarks included doubts about whether Harris is Black or Indian, which drew strong reactions, especially given Harris' history of facing racist and sexist attacks. The White House condemned Trump's comments as repulsive and insulting.
summary: Republican presidential candidate and former president Donald Trump questioned Kamala Harris' racial identity during a speech at the National Association of Black Journalists, causing backlash. Trump’s remarks included doubts about whether Harris is Black or Indian, which drew strong reactions, especially given Harris' history of facing racist and sexist attacks. The White House condemned Trump's comments as repulsive and insulting.

title: 'You don't even say hello... disgraceful': Donald Trump slams Black journalist at Chicago convention. Watch
content: ​"First of all, I don't think I have ever been asked a question in such a horrible manner, the first question. You don't even say Hello! how are you? Are you with ABC? Because I think they ae a fake news network and a terrible network. And I think it's disgraceful that I came here in good spirit. I love the Black population of this country. I have done so much for the Black population of the country, including employment..." Donald Trump said.
summary: ​"First of all, I don't think I have ever been asked a question in such a horrible manner, the first question. You don't even say Hello! how are you? Are you with ABC? Because I think they ae a fake news network and a terrible network. And I think it's disgraceful that I came here in good spirit. I love the Black population of this country. I have done so much for the Black population of the country, including employment..." Donald Trump said.

Barron Trump had a fake name in school, never ate lunch with friends
content: Everyone at Oxbridge knew that he was Barron Trump, Donald Trump's youngest son but on record he was Jack so that there could be no breach into his school data, grades etc. ​It was Melania's request that Barron Trump's name should not appear on any social media post regarding the school and he was the only student who was never mentioned in the yearbook.
summary: Everyone at Oxbridge knew that he was Barron Trump, Donald Trump's youngest son but on record he was Jack so that there could be no breach into his school data, grades etc. ​It was Melania's request that Barron Trump's name should not appear on any social media post regarding the school and he was the only student who was never mentioned in the yearbook.

5 things to know about Josh Shapiro, likely to be Kamala Harris' VP pick
content: A recent video of a strong and confident Josh Shapiro asking Donald Trump to stop sh** talking about America has gone viral. "You ever see this guy? He kind of meanders over, can't really walk well, and he goes over to the flag and hugs the flag. I love the flag, but it’s a weird thing he does. While he’s hugging the flag, he’s ripping away our freedoms."

'If Kamala Harris becomes president...': Her ex-boyfriend says 'she'll deport my a**'
content: ​Willie said he was flooded by media inquiries abut Harris since President Joe Biden stepped aside endorsing Kamala Harris as the presidential candidate. The former California Assembly Speaker said he was not directly in touch with Kamala Harris but has some advice for her. When Willie and Harris were in a relationship in 1994, Harris was 29 and he was 60.

title: Who is Donald Trump's nephew Fred? Why he would vote for Kamala Harris
content: Fred said he always voted for the Democrats -- for Hillary Clinton in 2016 and Joe Biden in 2020 and would vote for Kamala Harris in 2024. But he never spoke against his uncle. He said he would attend his uncle's inauguration if Donald Trump wins the election and he's invited.
summary: Fred said he always voted for the Democrats -- for Hillary Clinton in 2016 and Joe Biden in 2020 and would vote for Kamala Harris in 2024. But he never spoke against his uncle. He said he would attend his uncle's inauguration if Donald Trump wins the election and he's invited.

title: US freezes $95 million in aid to Georgia over 'anti-democratic actions'
content: The United States announced a freeze on over $95 million in aid to Georgia due to recent anti-democratic actions, including a law seen as repressive. Secretary of State Antony Blinken stated the move is incompatible with EU and Nato norms. The US will continue support for programs benefiting the Georgian people.
summary: The United States announced a freeze on over $95 million in aid to Georgia due to recent anti-democratic actions, including a law seen as repressive. Secretary of State Antony Blinken stated the move is incompatible with EU and Nato norms. The US will continue support for programs benefiting the Georgian people.

title: Kamala Harris' stepdaughter Ella went to a restaurant. Here's what happened outside
content: ​Kamala Harris' stepdaughter Ella Emhoff went to a restaurant for lunch and there was an altercation outside involving her Secret Service detail leading to an arrest. The New York Post reported that when Ella was having lunch with a friend inside the restaurant, a New Yorker confronted her security personnel outside without realizing that he was a part of the Secret Service.
summary: ​Kamala Harris' stepdaughter Ella Emhoff went to a restaurant for lunch and there was an altercation outside involving her Secret Service detail leading to an arrest. The New York Post reported that when Ella was having lunch with a friend inside the restaurant, a New Yorker confronted her security personnel outside without realizing that he was a part of the Secret Service.

title: Trump says he doesn't need concerts after Megan Thee Stallion 'twerks' at Kamala Harris rally
content: ​MAGA prudes are angry with Megan Thee Stallion's performance at Kamala Harris' fundraiser in Atlanta as they denigrated Kamala Harris as a non-serious contestant requiring Megan to twerk on the stage for votes. ​"Crazy Kamala Harris, voted the WORST Vice President in American history, needed a concert to bring people into the Atlanta arena, and they started leaving 5 minutes into her speech. I don’t need concerts or entertainers, I just have to MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!!!" Trump posted on Truth Social.

Trump's says world leaders will walk all over Kamala in attack seen as denigrating women
content: Former US President Donald Trump sparked controversy by saying world leaders would treat Kamala Harris as a 'playtoy' if she became President. Trump criticized Harris, describing her as 'weak, dishonest, and dangerously liberal.' His comments came despite Harris leading among women voters. Trump's remarks drew backlash for their sexist tone, raising debates about gender in politics.
summary: Former US President Donald Trump sparked controversy by saying world leaders would treat Kamala Harris as a 'playtoy' if she became President. Trump criticized Harris, describing her as 'weak, dishonest, and dangerously liberal.' His comments came despite Harris leading among women voters. Trump's remarks drew backlash for their sexist tone, raising debates about gender in politics.

title: Did Kamala Harris ask her staff to stand and say 'Good Morning, General'?
content: Vice president Kamala Harris has been accused of antagonizing her staff resulting in an "extraordinary high" exodus rate from her office. Her ex-employees called her a tyrannical boss who terrified and cursed her employees. An account claims Kamala Harris discouraged direct eye contact and made her employees stand in attention when she entered a room. Former House speaker Kevin McCarthy told Fox News that nobody lasts very long working for Kamala Harris.
summary: Vice president Kamala Harris has been accused of antagonizing her staff resulting in an "extraordinary high" exodus rate from her office. Her ex-employees called her a tyrannical boss who terrified and cursed her employees. An account claims Kamala Harris discouraged direct eye contact and made her employees stand in attention when she entered a room. Former House speaker Kevin McCarthy told Fox News that nobody lasts very long working for Kamala Harris.

title: Myanmar junta extends emergency rule, blames 'terrorist acts'
content: Myanmar's military government extended its state of emergency by six months amidst ongoing fighting and economic challenges. The junta cited the need for additional time to prepare voter lists for a promised 2025 election. The military originally declared the emergency after a February 2021 coup, resulting in a violent crackdown on widespread protests.
summary: Myanmar's military government extended its state of emergency by six months amidst ongoing fighting and economic challenges. The junta cited the need for additional time to prepare voter lists for a promised 2025 election. The military originally declared the emergency after a February 2021 coup, resulting in a violent crackdown on widespread protests.
